short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sanitizes theme related code when copying text on Azure DevOps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dear dark theme users in Azure DevOps: you potentially render fields illegible for your fellow light theme coworkers after copying over text from other fields! This plugin sanitizes theme related code when copying text on Azure DevOps, which should fix most of the legibility problems.

Features:
- Cut and copy via Ctrl/Command + x and c will be sanitized
- A dedicated button allows you to sanitize an entire field in one go.

This is a workaround for the bug reported at:
https://developercommunity.visualstudio.com/t/text-copied-pasted-from-dark-mode-causes-the-text/1472018
